forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Chance of late night showers. Low 4C.
forecastday.fcttext: A few showers developing late. Lows overnight in the low 40s.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies this evening will give way to occasional showers overnight. Low 4C. Winds ESE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy this evening followed by increasing clouds with showers developing after midnight. Low near 40F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.
